Reviews.Title: Paid over $1,000
Reviews.Author: S.
Reviews.Content: Camera kit is good.  The bag should have two zippers that meet in the middle.  I have had my camera fall out of one of the pockets because it was not completely zipped.  Camera already has dropped in price.  Shop around.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy Great Camera
Reviews.Author: keith
Reviews.Content: Great Camera 24.9 megapixals easy to use, has alot of great features. has the ability to upgrade on lens and accessories.So much for your money quality of pictures is excelent.

Reviews.Title: I like it
Reviews.Author: Zbigniew Nowak "Zen"
Reviews.Content: I got this camera after reading reviews here on amazon and also doing my research on review.Picture quality with the 18-55 mm lens are not bad. White balance is a little off.I would say overall I like it.
